Posts.EditableText: I'm trying to create a 'Global Command' where if the player types in a certain code, it'll make an item appear in their inventory. I was thinking... [u:3pzf4msv]Command Pattern[/u:3pzf4msv] ((I wanted some type of numerical code here. Do I just put it in?)) [i:3pzf4msv]Name[/i:3pzf4msv]: Debug [i:3pzf4msv]Unresolved object text[/i:3pzf4msv]: I didn't get that. [u:3pzf4msv][i:3pzf4msv]Script[/i:3pzf4msv][/u:3pzf4msv] [code:3pzf4msv]if (Got(Debug)) { } else { AddToInventory (Debug) }[/code:3pzf4msv] That worked! Sorry about the post!
Posts.HTML:
I'm trying to create a 'Global Command' where if the player types in a certain code, it'll make an item appear in their inventory.

I was thinking...

Command Pattern
((I wanted some type of numerical code here. Do I just put it in?))
Name: Debug
Unresolved object text:
I didn't get that.

Script
if (Got(Debug)) {
}
else {
  AddToInventory (Debug)
}


That worked! Sorry about the post!
